Articles.Content:
It has air brake and tail hook for Carrier landing, I'll let you know when I get it on deck lol.

U-2 1960

King Fisher 1943

Any change you could post the .craft files? I'd LOVE to fly that U2! (also a mods list might be nice XD)

Great work, btw. The kingfisher looks great as well. I'm not really familiar with the F-8, but a quick google images search looks promising.
